title: Nikola Simić (footballer, born 1996)
text:
Nikola Simić (; born 21 December 1996) is a <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>, playing for <a href="FK%20Vojvodina">Vojvodina</a>.
Club career.
Vojvodina.
On 18 July 2018 Simić signed a three-year-deal with <a href="FK%20Vojvodina">Vojvodina</a>. He had his debut for the club on 2 September 2018, replacing <a href="Emil%20Rockov">Emil Rockov</a> in 32nd minute of 4:1 home defeat against <a href="Red%20Star%20Belgrade">Red Star Belgrade</a>.
